message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's in excellent condition and I believe it's a great value for you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $12,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate you coming down a bit. While I value your interest, $12,000 is a bit too low for me at this point. I'm willing to come down to $13,000, as a compromise.  Let's find a way to make this work for both of us!
